Class Shelf

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shelf
  • public class Shelf
extends java.lang.Object
    A Shelf consists of multiple books and helps keep them organized

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<Book> books
      A collection of Books stored in this shelf.
      private int capacity
      How many books can this shelf store?
      private java.lang.String category
      What kind of books are stored in this shelf?

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Shelf​(java.lang.String category, int capacity)
      Constructor to initialize the shelf.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addBook​(Book book)
      If the the book doesn't already exist in the shelf, add it otherwise return false.
      boolean addBook​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String author, int id)
      If the the book doesn't already exist in the shelf, add it otherwise return false.
      java.util.List<Book> getBooks()
      Returns the list of books
      Book getBooks​(int id)
      Get the book with the given id.
      int getCapacity()  
      java.lang.String getCategory()
      What kind of books does this shelf contain?
      int getNumBooks()  
      java.lang.Boolean isRedundant​(Shelf shelf)
      Is this shelf redundant, i.e, does the given shelf consists of all all the books present in this shelf?
      java.lang.Boolean organize()
      Sort the books according to their Id.

      • Shelf

        public Shelf​(java.lang.String category,
             int capacity)
        Constructor to initialize the shelf. Apart from the parameters given, also initializes books.

        capacity - Capacity of the shelf

        Parameters:

      • addBook

        public boolean addBook​(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String author,
                       int id)
        If the the book doesn't already exist in the shelf, add it otherwise return false.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the book
        author - author of the book
        id - id of the book
        Returns:
        whether the operation was a success

      • addBook

        public boolean addBook​(Book book)
        If the the book doesn't already exist in the shelf, add it otherwise return false.
        Parameters:
        book - book to be added into the shelf
        Returns:
        whether the operation was a success

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        Returns:
        Get the capacity of the shelf

      • getNumBooks

        public int getNumBooks()
        Returns:
        how many books are currently present in the shelf

      • organize

        public java.lang.Boolean organize()
        Sort the books according to their Id.
        Returns:
        Return true if the operation was successful

      • isRedundant

        public java.lang.Boolean isRedundant​(Shelf shelf)
        Is this shelf redundant, i.e, does the given shelf consists of all all the books present in this shelf?
        Parameters:
        shelf - Shelf to be checked with
        Returns:
        A boolean mentioning if the said condition is true or not

      • getBooks

        public java.util.List<Book> getBooks()
        Returns the list of books
        Returns:
        List of books
